name: Ownable
description: The contract has an owner address, and provides basic authorization control whitch simplifies the implementation of user permissions. This contract is based on the source code at: https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/openzeppelin-solidity/blob/master/contracts/ownership/Ownable.sol.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: A processed deposit event. An event which is triggered when the owner is changed.

parameterDecorators.name: previousOwner
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the previous owner.

parameterDecorators.name: newOwner
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the new owner.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

parameterDecorators.name: _newOwner
parameterDecorators.description: The address to transfer ownership to.
